description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. An amusing game where a little dot can move around following the track. Using your skills, you just might be able to maneuver the tracks and avoid touching the cats to win. The full version of this game contains a shocking and surprising twist.
